title: HOLO Camera Version  2.7 [ANDROID] {shilpa143} -=[Team OS]=-
description:
HOLO CAMERA VERSION 2.7

[img]http://s28.postimg.org/u0qnfb4wt/unnamed.png[/img] 


[b]Description[/b]


[b]******************FEATURED ON REDIFF NEWS, SILOBREAKER AND CNET*****************


Holo Camera+ is designed to work with all devices running Android 4.0 ( ICS ) and higher.


HOLO CAMERA VERSION 2.7 IS HERE!! FEATURING A SLICK NEW UI !


Holo Camera+ is a source compiled, minimalistic version of the AOSP Android 4.4 KITKAT Camera.

Forget the days of washed out, blurry images, with cool colors. Our special OptiÃ¢â€žÂ¢ mode BETA is here to liven up all your pics! Now comes with After Effects BETA! A revolutionary new way to edit pics BEFORE saving them!

Holo Camera+ has the following features:

CAMERA:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ 3 modes: camera, video recorder and panorama
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Android 4.4 ARC UI
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Volume Rocker as Camera Shutter
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ New FX modes
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ New Scene modes
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Silent mode (might not work on some devices)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Pinch to zoom
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Picture quality setting (low/medium/high/ultra)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Timer
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Burst mode
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Thumbnail Review
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ ISO Mode Settings
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Flicker Reduction/Anti-Banding
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Guidelines
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Video quality adjustable
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Per thumbnail context menu.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Sliding Drawer for quick options.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Flash Mode
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Live FX
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ "ULTRA HD" resolution for devices with more than 8mp Camera. It can be turned on from Miscellaneous Tweaks>Ultra HD
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Configurable UHD Aspect Ratio: Choose between 4:3 or 16:9
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Separate tweaks for front and back camera.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Scene mode
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Auto Exposure Settings
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Skin Tone Enhancement (NEW!)
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ HDR Support
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Additional Settings ( SWIPE RIGHT FROM CAMERA AND PRESS MENU OR SWIPE FROM LEFT MARGIN TO ACCESS:)
* Silent Shutter Mode.
* Sunlight Visibility Mode
* Storage Location Settings.
* OPTIÃ¢â€žÂ¢ MODE BETA: With OPTIÃ¢â€žÂ¢ CONTRAST, OPTIÃ¢â€žÂ¢ BRIGHTNESS, OPTIÃ¢â€žÂ¢ SHARPNESS AND OPTIÃ¢â€žÂ¢ SATURATION. With smart pixel by pixel recoloring LIVE and adjustable parameters, forget the days of bad images, take awesome pics with the most vibrant colors and clearest details!

Note: Opti Mode is a beta feature, and might not work on certain devices. Please DO NOT rate me bad because of Opti Mode, because Opti Mode scans your phone's hardware abstraction layer (HAL). If anything does not work in Opti mode, it is probably your phone/camera's fault. Please be considerate before rating me 1 star. :)

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ The ALL NEW AFTER EFFECTS (BETA): A Revolutionary way to edit pics before saving!
Currently works with the back camera and supports 10 adjustable tweaks:

-Rotation
-Sepia Toning(RGB)
-Sharpness
-Contrast
-Saturation
-Snow Effect
-Blur
-Brightness
-Mean Removal
-Flip
-Rounded corners
-More coming!

GALLERY:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Ultra fast photos and videos viewer
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Grid view/Filmstrip view
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Swipe to delete
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Slideshow mode
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ TONS of cool new features!!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ A VERY POWERFUL Image editor.[/b]

[b] What's New
Version 2.7.2:
Happy New Year!
-Added an option to launch either Holo Mode or AFX mode by default in the launch screen. Once you activate this, it can be deactivated by going to Software Tweaks>Clear launch settings
-Fixed text alignment problems in startup screen[/b]
